product_name: Salomon Ellipse GTX Hiking Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Salomon Ellipse GTX hiking shoes provide waterproof protection in a lightweight, agile and resilient design for all-weather, fast-paced hiking. Breathable and abrasion-resistant nylon mesh uppers feature synthetic leather overlays that wrap and secure insteps for a precise fit; toe caps provide protection. Gore-Tex(R) waterproof liners let feet breathe while protecting them from the elements, keeping them dry and comfortable. Polyester mesh linings wick moisture away from your feet to keep them comfortable. EVA midsoles cushion each step, and feature molded arch shanks for support and fit. OS Tendon thermoplastic urethane frames run along the outsoles of the shoes to facilitate heel-to-toe transitions and push-off efficiency. Nonmarking Contagrip(R) rubber outsoles on the Salomon Ellipse GTX hiking shoes shoes deliver traction across mixed terrain and sloppy trail conditions. Fit tip: runs true to size.
short_description: The Salomon Ellipse GTX hiking shoes provide waterproof protection in a lightweight, agile and resilient design for all-weather, fast-paced hiking.
